OMG I waited so long to get this game, and now I have it tnx to Dobrus, thnx Dobrus...

01. Install the Game. "Don't Automatically Start The Game After"
02. Copy & Paste The RicochetInfinity.exe to C:\Program Files\Ricochet Infinity\
Yes REPLACE.
03. Copy & Paste The ReflexiveArcade.dll to C:\Program Files\Ricochet Infinity\ReflexiveArcade.
Yes RELACE.

Inside the Game Folder, C:\Program Files\Ricochet Infinity Right click the Application, RicochetInfinity.exe and choose Send To Desktop Create Shortcut.

Delete the other Shortcut that was there, if there was one there, and Double click that, Play and Enjoy the Game.

Easy as Pie....
